metadata.description:
Welcome to the Alpha Wave Experience by Dan Ghenacia on OpenSea. Discover the collection.

The Alpha Wave Experience is a rotating light contemporary art installation that triggers the brain and the optic nerve, inducing alpha wave frequencies through flickering light effects. 

MindArt is an exceptional enhancement to the Alpha Wave Experience providing a visual representation of the visitorâ€™s personal journey using to neurotransmitter headsets. The visitor becomes co-creator of the digital artwork generated from their brainwaves variations. 

More information: https://www.alphawaveexperience.com/
metadata.name: Mindart #
